Instructions.Enabled: true/false - allow you to skip cases individually if you need to.
Instructions.id: Use https://db.sp-tarkov.com/ to find ID of this item you want to rejig
Instructions.H_Cells: How wide you want the case to be internally - Must be a whole number, no double quotes here. Be careful if you're making it smaller than normal. See Readme.
Instructions.V_Cells: How high you want the case to be internally - Must be a whole number, no double quotes here Be careful if you're making it smaller than normal. See Readme.
Instructions.Price_Multiplier: The new price of this case will be the original price multiplied by this. Use to help balance if you make a case much bigger/more useful, or the reverse - must be between 0.01 and 10, just to stop you going mad.
Instructions.filterIDs: Make sure this is an array of comma separated IDs - Use https://db.sp-tarkov.com/ to find IDs - no trailing comma
